SELECT tcgi.*, CONCAT(tcu.FIRST_NAME, ' ', tcu.LAST_NAME) as OWNER_NAME, tcu.ID as OWNER_ID, tcu.AVATAR_URL as AVATAR_URL, tca.* FROM stan_blog_content_general_info tcgi JOIN stan_blog_core_user tcu ON tcgi.OWNER_ID = tcu.ID JOIN stan_blog_content_admin tca ON tca.CONTENT_ID = tcgi.ID WHERE 1=1 AND tcgi.DELETED = false AND tcgi.PUBLIC_TO_ALL = true
AND ( tcgi.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR tcgi.DESCRIPTION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
AND tca.BANNED = true
AND tca.RECOMMENDED = true
AND tcgi.TOPIC = #{topic}
ORDER BY tcgi.CREATE_TIME DESC
